Definition.Description: Health reports a value from 0-100%, indicating the composite performance of all other metrics.  Instead of monitoring each individual metric for all controllers, many sites simply monitor the Loop Health.
Definition.Document: The performance of all the metrics calculated for a loop can be combined into a Loop Health value.  The Loop Health reports a value from 0-100%, indicating the composite performance of all other metrics.  Instead of monitoring each individual metric for all controllers, many sites simply monitor the Loop Health.
